page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE cont'd
page.content:
I went out after I helped my mum wash the dinner pots. I had a game of football until tea-time. After tea, mum and dad were working out the plans for the new kitchen. Our new kitchen cupboards are going to be in pine. My dad is going to buy my mum what they call a split-level cooker. I can't wait to move into our new house.
{FOOTNOTE On first meeting children in Shirebrook ,visitors could gain the impression that they are tough,hard and self-sufficient.Although partly true,they are also generous,warm - hearted and unsophisticated.
